nodes.text: Caeleb's mother was a Human woman who lived on the planet Dalicron-4 during the time of the Galactic Empire.

A Human woman lived on Dalicron-4, with her husband and her child, Caeleb. The three of them were all Force-sensitive and they lived in a house on inside a "bubble", where the Force did not exist. In 3 ABY, Dark Jedi Tol Skaros traveled to the house where the family lived and planned to capture Caeleb. He attacked the boy's parents and the boy's mother was killed by a group of Neks and Viper probe droids that had accompanied Skaros.
